Beginning of the line <span>Content</span>. End of line1.
<span>Beginning of the line</span>. End of line2.
Beginning of the line. <span>End of line3</span>

Beginning of the line <!--Comment-->. End of line4.
<!--Beginning of the line5-->
Beginning of the line. <!--End of line6-->

Beginning of the line <!--Comment7
with multiple lines8-->
<!--Beginning of the line9
and the second line10-->
Beginning of the line. <!--End of line11
and the last line12-->
